mainEntity.name: Is asbestos testing required before renovation or demolition in Calgary?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Alberta Occupational Health and Safety regulations require asbestos surveys before renovation or demolition of buildings constructed prior to 1990 to identify designated substances and prevent worker exposure.

mainEntity.name: Do you provide regulatory support for asbestos-related enforcement inquiries?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Western Health & Safety provides technical and documentation support to help employers demonstrate due diligence during Alberta OHS or WorkSafeBC enforcement inquiries.

mainEntity.name: What documentation is provided after asbestos testing?

acceptedAnswer.text: Clients receive a formal asbestos assessment report including sampling methods, laboratory results, interpretation, recommendations, and professional sign-off by a competent individual.
